meanings: contact, (전화) call, contact, get[keep] in touch (with), (전화하다) call

examples.korean: They embraced and promised to keep in touch. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 서로 껴안으며 계속 연락하기로 약속했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
